section_1_text.eng:
â° It can be easy to forget or feel overwhelmed by caregiving or housework tasks. Establishing a routine around these can help!

section_2_text.eng:
ğŸ˜ƒ Having conversations about how you can share family responsibilities helps both you and your spouse understand each other better.

section_3_text.eng:
ğŸ˜’ It can be hard to remember to ask for help.
